flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
ピンチになると　めが　うるみだし
かがやく。　そのひかりに　むれる
なかまと　てきに　たちむかうのだ。

위험해지면 눈을 글썽이면서
반짝인다. 그 빛에 모이는
동료와 함께 적에 대항한다.

一旦陷入危機，眼睛就會變得
濕潤並發光。和被光亮召集來的
夥伴們一起對抗敵人。

Quand il est dans le pétrin, ses yeux deviennent
luisants. Ses semblables accourent alors et
forment avec lui un banc de combat.

Gerät es in Not, tränen seine Augen. Ihr Glänzen
lockt Artgenossen an, mit denen es dann im
Verbund den Feind angreift.

Al sentirse amenazado, sus ojos emiten cierto
brillo, algo que atrae a otros miembros de su
especie, y juntos luchan como un mismo ente.

Quando è in pericolo, i suoi occhi iniziano
a brillare e il luccichio richiama i suoi simili,
con cui forma un banco per attaccare il nemico.

When it’s in trouble, its eyes moisten and begin
to shine. The shining light attracts its comrades,
and they stand together against their enemies.

ピンチになると　目が　潤みだし
輝く。　その光に　群れる
仲間と　敵に　立ち向かうのだ。

一旦陷入危机，眼睛就会变得
湿润并发光。和汇聚在这光亮中的
伙伴们一起对抗敌人。

とても　よわく　とても　おいしいので
つねに　だれからも　ねらわれているが
いじめていると　ひどいめに　あうぞ。

너무도 약하고 너무도 맛있어서
항상 모두가 노리지만
괴롭히면 험한 꼴을 당한다.

牠非常弱小，又非常美味，
所以總是成為被攻擊的目標，
不過若欺負牠，只會吃苦頭哦。

Avec son air chétif et sa chair appétissante,
tous les Pokémon en ont après lui... mais ceux
qui ont essayé ont eu des problèmes.

Ein sehr schwaches und leckeres Pokémon,
auf das es stets irgendjemand abgesehen hat.
Doch Vorsicht: Wer es ärgert, wird dies bereuen!

Debido a su aspecto débil y a su apetitoso
sabor, son el blanco de muchos depredadores,
pero quien se las ve con ellos sale mal parado.

A causa dell’aspetto inoffensivo e del sapore
delizioso, attira su di sé molti predatori che però
si pentono regolarmente di averlo importunato.

It’s awfully weak and notably tasty, so everyone
is always out to get it. As it happens, anyone
trying to bully it receives a painful lesson.

とても　弱く　とても　美味しいので
常に　誰からも　狙われているが
いじめていると　ひどい目に　あうぞ。

因为非常弱小，又非常美味，
所以谁都会袭击它，
但如果欺负它，就会吃苦头哦。

よわいので　むれで　こうどう。
だが　はぐれて　１ぴきで　およぐ
すがたを　みかけることも　おおい。

약해서 무리 지어 행동한다.
하지만 혼자 떨어져서 헤엄치는
모습도 자주 볼 수 있다.

因為很弱小，總是以群體行動。
但也能經常見到與群體走散了的
弱丁魚單獨游動的樣子。

Il se déplace en banc pour pallier sa faiblesse,
mais il n’est pas rare de voir un Froussardine
nager en solitaire.

Es bewegt sich nur im Schwarm fort, da es sehr
schwach ist. Oft sieht man aber auch einzelne
Exemplare, die vom Schwarm getrennt wurden.

Se agrupan debido a su manifiesta debilidad,
aunque también se suelen avistar nadando
en solitario, separados de su banco.

È molto debole, per questo agisce sempre con
il suo banco. Spesso, però, si vedono esemplari
vagare da soli dopo aver perso di vista gli altri.

They’re weak, so they move in schools.
However, they can also often be seen all alone,
having strayed from the school.

弱いので　群れで　行動。
だが　はぐれて　１匹で　泳ぐ
姿を　見かけることも　多い。

因为很弱小，所以会群体行动。
但也经常能见到走散后
独自１只在游泳的样子。

ピンチに　なると　ひとみを　ひからせ
なかまを　よぶ。　その　ひかりは
４０キロメートル　さきまで　とどく。

위험해지면 눈을 반짝여서
동료를 부른다. 그 빛은
40km 밖까지 도달한다.

遇到危機時會讓眼睛發光
來呼喚夥伴。那種光能夠
傳到４０公里遠的地方。

Il fait briller ses pupilles pour rameuter
ses congénères lorsque la situation tourne
mal. Le signal est visible à 40 km de distance.

Bei Gefahr ruft es seine Artgenossen herbei,
indem es seine Augen aufglänzen lässt. Dieses
Licht ist 40 km weit zu sehen.

Al sentirse amenazado, alerta a sus congéneres
emitiendo un brillo por las pupilas que puede
verse incluso a 40 kilómetros de distancia.

Quando si trova in difficoltà chiede aiuto ai
suoi compagni emettendo una luce dalle pupille
visibile fino a 40 km di distanza.

When it’s in a jam, its shining eyes attract
others of its kind. The light from its eyes is
visible almost 25 miles away.

ピンチに　なると　瞳を　光らせ
仲間を　呼ぶ。　その　光は
４０キロメートル　先まで　届く。

遇到危机时，会让瞳孔发光来呼唤伙伴。
那光线能抵达４０公里开外的地方。

１ぴきでは　とても　ひよわなため
むれることで　てきに　たちむかう
のうりょくを　かくとくした。

1마리로는 너무나도 허약해서
무리를 지어 상대에게 맞서는
능력을 습득했다.

單獨１隻十分弱小，
所以學會了透過群體行動，
來對抗敵人的能力。

Individuellement, ils sont très faibles. Ils ont donc
développé une tactique de déplacement en banc
pour résister aux ennemis.

Weil es alleine unheimlich schwach ist, hat es die
Fähigkeit erworben, einen Schwarm zu formen.
So kann es sich seinen Gegnern stellen.

Debido a su manifiesta debilidad cuando van
solos, han adquirido la capacidad de agruparse
en bancos a la hora de enfrentarse a un enemigo.

Presi singolarmente sono estremamente deboli.
Ciò li ha portati ad acquisire l’abilità di formare
un banco quando affrontano il nemico.

Individually, they’re incredibly weak. It’s by
gathering up into schools that they’re able
to confront opponents.

１匹では　とても　ひ弱なため
群れることで　敵に　立ち向かう
能力を　獲得した。

单独１只十分弱小，
所以学会了通过群体行动
来对抗敌人的能力。

きけんを　かんじると　めが　うるむ。
なみだの　ひかりが　シグナルとなって
たくさんの　なかまが　あつまるのだ。

위험을 느끼면 눈물을 글썽인다.
눈물의 빛은 그들만의 신호로
신호를 받고 많은 동료가 모인다.

感覺到危險時眼睛就會變得濕潤。
眼淚的光亮會成為召集夥伴的信號，
讓許多的弱丁魚聚在一起。

Ses yeux se mouillent quand il sent le danger
approcher. Le scintillement de ses larmes sert
de signal pour que ses congénères se rassemblent.

Wenn es Gefahr verspürt, tränen seine Augen.
Das Leuchten der Tränen fungiert als Signal,
mit dem es etliche Artgenossen zu sich ruft.

Al sentirse amenazado, le lloran los ojos. La luz
que se refleja en sus lágrimas sirve de señal a sus
congéneres para agruparse en gran número.

Quando percepisce un pericolo gli lacrimano
gli occhi. Lo scintillio delle sue lacrime è un
segnale che indica ai suoi simili di radunarsi.

When it senses danger, its eyes tear up.
The sparkle of its tears signals other
Wishiwashi to gather.

危険を　感じると　目が　潤む。
涙の　光りが　シグナルとなって
たくさんの　仲間が　集まるのだ。

感觉到危险时眼睛就会变得湿润。
眼泪的光亮会成为召集伙伴的信号，
让许多的弱丁鱼聚在一起。

move.effect:
Transfers 1/4 the user's max HP into a doll that absorbs damage and causes most negative move effects to fail.  If the user leaves the field, the doll will vanish.  If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.

The doll takes damage as normal, using the user's stats and types, and will break when its HP reaches zero.  Self-inflicted damage from confusion or recoil is not absorbed.  Healing effects from opponents ignore the doll and heal the user as normal.  Moves that work based on the user's HP still do so; the doll's HP does not influence any move.

The doll will block major status effects, confusion, and flinching.  The effects of smelling salts and wake up slap do not trigger against a doll, even if the Pokémon behind the doll has the appropriate major status effect.  Multi-turn trapping moves like wrap will hit the doll for their regular damage, but the multi-turn trapping and damage effects will not activate.

Moves blocked or damage absorbed by the doll do not count as hitting the user or inflicting damage for any effects that respond to such, e.g., avalanche, counter, or a rowap berry.  magic coat still works as normal, even against moves the doll would block.  Opposing Pokémon that damage the doll with a leech move like absorb are healed as normal.

It will also block acupressure, block, the curse effect of curse, dream eater, embargo, flatter, gastro acid, grudge, heal block, leech seed, lock on, mean look, mimic, mind reader, nightmare, pain split, psycho shift, spider web, sketch, swagger, switcheroo, trick, worry seed, and yawn.  A Pokémon affected by yawn before summoning the doll will still fall to sleep.

The doll blocks intimidate, but all other abilities act as though the doll did not exist.  If the user has an ability that absorbs moves of a certain type for HP (such as volt absorb absorbing thunder wave), such moves will not be blocked.

life orb and berries that cause confusion still work as normal, but their respective HP loss and confusion are absorbed/blocked by the doll.

The user is still vulnerable to damage inflicted when entering or leaving the field, such as by pursuit or spikes; however, the doll will block the poison effect of toxic spikes.

The doll is passed on by baton pass.  It keeps its existing HP, but uses the replacement Pokémon's stats and types for damage calculation.

All other effects work as normal.
move.short_effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

move.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's IVs.

Power is given by `x * 40 / 63 + 30`.  `x` is obtained by arranging bit 1 from the IV for each of Special Defense, Special Attack, Speed, Defense, Attack, and HP in that order.  (Bit 1 is 1 if the IV is of the form `4n + 2` or `4n + 3`.  `x` is then 64 * Special Defense IV bit 1, plus 32 * Special Attack IV bit 1, etc.)

Power is always between 30 and 70, inclusive.  Average power is 49.5.

Type is given by `y * 15 / 63`, where `y` is similar to `x` above, except constructed from bit 0.  (Bit 0 is 1 if the IV is odd.)  The result is looked up in the following table.

Value | Type
----: | --------
    0 | fighting
    1 | flying
    2 | poison
    3 | ground
    4 | rock
    5 | bug
    6 | ghost
    7 | steel
    8 | fire
    9 | water
   10 | grass
   11 | electric
   12 | psychic
   13 | ice
   14 | dragon
   15 | dark

This move thus cannot be normal.  Most other types have an equal 1/16 chance to be selected, given random IVs.  However, due to the flooring used here, bug, fighting, and grass appear 5/64 of the time, and dark only 1/64 of the time.
move.short_effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

move.effect:
Transfers 1/4 the user's max HP into a doll that absorbs damage and causes most negative move effects to fail.  If the user leaves the field, the doll will vanish.  If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.

The doll takes damage as normal, using the user's stats and types, and will break when its HP reaches zero.  Self-inflicted damage from confusion or recoil is not absorbed.  Healing effects from opponents ignore the doll and heal the user as normal.  Moves that work based on the user's HP still do so; the doll's HP does not influence any move.

The doll will block major status effects, confusion, and flinching.  The effects of smelling salts and wake up slap do not trigger against a doll, even if the Pokémon behind the doll has the appropriate major status effect.  Multi-turn trapping moves like wrap will hit the doll for their regular damage, but the multi-turn trapping and damage effects will not activate.

Moves blocked or damage absorbed by the doll do not count as hitting the user or inflicting damage for any effects that respond to such, e.g., avalanche, counter, or a rowap berry.  magic coat still works as normal, even against moves the doll would block.  Opposing Pokémon that damage the doll with a leech move like absorb are healed as normal.

It will also block acupressure, block, the curse effect of curse, dream eater, embargo, flatter, gastro acid, grudge, heal block, leech seed, lock on, mean look, mimic, mind reader, nightmare, pain split, psycho shift, spider web, sketch, swagger, switcheroo, trick, worry seed, and yawn.  A Pokémon affected by yawn before summoning the doll will still fall to sleep.

The doll blocks intimidate, but all other abilities act as though the doll did not exist.  If the user has an ability that absorbs moves of a certain type for HP (such as volt absorb absorbing thunder wave), such moves will not be blocked.

life orb and berries that cause confusion still work as normal, but their respective HP loss and confusion are absorbed/blocked by the doll.

The user is still vulnerable to damage inflicted when entering or leaving the field, such as by pursuit or spikes; however, the doll will block the poison effect of toxic spikes.

The doll is passed on by baton pass.  It keeps its existing HP, but uses the replacement Pokémon's stats and types for damage calculation.

All other effects work as normal.
move.short_effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

lock on, mind reader, and no guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

move.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's IVs.

Power is given by `x * 40 / 63 + 30`.  `x` is obtained by arranging bit 1 from the IV for each of Special Defense, Special Attack, Speed, Defense, Attack, and HP in that order.  (Bit 1 is 1 if the IV is of the form `4n + 2` or `4n + 3`.  `x` is then 64 * Special Defense IV bit 1, plus 32 * Special Attack IV bit 1, etc.)

Power is always between 30 and 70, inclusive.  Average power is 49.5.

Type is given by `y * 15 / 63`, where `y` is similar to `x` above, except constructed from bit 0.  (Bit 0 is 1 if the IV is odd.)  The result is looked up in the following table.

Value | Type
----: | --------
    0 | fighting
    1 | flying
    2 | poison
    3 | ground
    4 | rock
    5 | bug
    6 | ghost
    7 | steel
    8 | fire
    9 | water
   10 | grass
   11 | electric
   12 | psychic
   13 | ice
   14 | dragon
   15 | dark

This move thus cannot be normal.  Most other types have an equal 1/16 chance to be selected, given random IVs.  However, due to the flooring used here, bug, fighting, and grass appear 5/64 of the time, and dark only 1/64 of the time.
move.short_effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.
